Package org.atmosphere.vertx.samples.chat

Interface Summary
JacksonEncoder.Encodable Marker interface for Jackson.
 

Class Summary
ChatProtocol  
ChatRoom Simple annotated class that demonstrate the power of Atmosphere.
JacksonEncoder Encode a ChatProtocol into a String
Message  
ProtocolDecoder Decode a String into a ChatProtocol.
ResourceChat Simple chat resource demonstrating the power of Atmosphere.
Response  
UserDecoder Decode a String into a org.atmosphere.samples.chat.UserMessage.
UserMessage  
VertxChatServer A bootstrap class that start Vertx and Chat!.
VertxJerseyChat A bootstrap class that start Nettosphere and the Atmosphere Chat samples.
